f31fd61e-214c-5aaf-a888-81d9a579bd12.title: • Slump to be performed on every truck (50mm for hand placed concrete +/- 10mm) testing reduced to every 2nd truck after 5 days of pours if tests are consistent and within tolerance. a70fbe05-4e09-5533-803e-447bfc91eb40.title: Acceptance Criteria - No concrete can be poured if air or concrete temperature exceeds 30°C without Principal’s Representatives approval.

ebd608b3-5ae2-558f-8dfe-9f87ea3004a5.title: FH to confirm temperature on site prior to pouring.

1e66d473-f68a-5b1c-bf5a-e30d91fbed49.title: Acceptance Criteria - Concrete shall not be placed when the ground temperature is below 5°C unless precautions are in place.

f3997a18-d03a-5865-b563-6604d8f5df92.title: Record of conformity - This ITP signed & CL009E

4efb6a49-63e6-5c64-93ac-3e2a7d661b0c.title: Concrete shall not be placed when the temperature of the concrete mix is below 10°C unless approved

bfe97b9a-5ed0-58bb-835c-45ab1b29cbbf.title: Acceptance Criteria - Pour location recorded on plan at the completion of pouring each lot – CL 009C. Include progress with times.

e4cb7c53-a86c-5e39-a299-b0c2459348dc.title: Acceptance Criteria - Evaporation rate recorded every half hour. If evaporation rate is >= 1kg/m2/h works must cease and a transverse construction joint installed

ead27971-4c72-5b3a-a382-2e7098693dc7.title: Brooming shall be in a direction at right angles to the direction of the placing of the concrete.

ee2a8bb7-f136-5d0a-a782-4d798918339b.title: Acceptance Criteria - Concrete to be shall comprise traverse finishing, longitudinal straight-edge finishing, floating and then broom finishing, in that order.

a8a635ae-3d8e-5095-804d-a5e1e5991e61.title: Acceptance Criteria - Concrete to be wet cured for a minimum of 7 days.

81d5253e-9aa5-52b0-98f3-ff007cc83ff0.title: Details to be recorded in CL 009D

cd9be9bb-e19d-5b64-9861-f2c72a5fe878.title: Curing methods and details shown on post pour checklist CL009D.

a131e78f-64b8-5ed1-8744-75dc3ebbe7e4.title: Moist curing to commence as soon as possible after finishing. This will be wetted hessian mats covering the pour. The mats shall overlap to ensure sufficient coverage. Mats shall be kept saturated for not less then 7 days.

eb5244ae-8015-5dea-ad0c-06dd932a7c00.title: Initial Curing shall commence immediately after finishing operations have been completed.

b37c81a8-23d7-5f19-96c8-87e806dc8662.title: Acceptance Criteria - In the event where the air temperature is below 10oC or the completed pavement is expected to be exposed to freezing conditions, concrete placing must only take place with the prior approval of the Contract Administrator.
